document_title: Prostate cancer: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
Although it is impossible to completely prevent the disease, some factors below can help reduce the risk of the disease, including:
Prioritize providing nutrition to the body with a reasonable, scientific diet with lots of vegetables and fruits instead of overusing functional foods.; Exercise regularly to improve overall health as well as mental health, while maintaining a reasonable weight.; Actively screen if at risk of disease (advanced age, family members who have had the disease...).
subsection_title: ung thu tuyen tien liet.json. Prevention of prostate cancer

Although it is impossible to completely prevent the disease, some factors below can help reduce the risk of the disease, including:
